text: Patrice Rushen (September 30, 1954) is an American singer, composer and musician. She has had several hit songs. She is best known for the song "Forget Me Nots". She was born in Los Angeles, California. ==References== Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:American soul musicians Category:American R&B; musicians Category:American jazz musicians Category:American pop musicians Category:American rock musicians Category:American pianists Category:American composers Category:1954 births Category:Living people
title: Patrice Rushen
